summary: Language learning app with interactive lessons, mini games, and new units focused on asking about malls, shops, and places

new_feature_requests.summary: Add more units about asking for malls, shops and places

Add new conversation scenarios focused on asking about malls, shops, and places. Include dialogues for finding stores, asking for directions to shopping areas, inquiring about store locations, and asking what shops are nearby.

Add new culture entries about shopping customs, marketplace traditions, and commercial areas in African cultures corresponding to the 6 supported languages (Arabic, Swahili, Hausa, Amharic, Yoruba, Zulu).
Ensure the new shopping-related conversation scenarios and culture entries appear as unlockable nodes in the learning path, interleaved according to the existing buildLearningPath logic.
